name: Our Family Quilt
description:
"Our Family Quilt"  Life comes at you fast. Don't blink or you might miss it. What makes up a life? The people? The Memories? The beauty is in the living it and we only hope we carries those precious moments with us as we experience the evolution of our lives! 

Solve a series of puzzles and stitch together the experiences that make life worth living! 

Jason Rand - Programmer, Designer, UX

Catherine Rand - Art

DanzMacabre - Music, Sound Design, SFX, Story

Jillian Wagner - Story

All Code, Art, and Music was made for the GoGodot Jam 3
